amendment.description: Amendment sought to delete $99.5 million appropriated for the National Endowment for the Humanities.
amendment.purpose: An amendment printed in the Congressional Record of July 11, as amendment No. 11, that seeks to strike the $99.5 million appropriation for the National Endowment for the Humanities.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Chabot amendment (A027) Failed by recorded vote: 148 - 277 (Roll no. 518).
